name: Lotos Quazar F SAE 5W-30
description: Lotos Quazar F SAE 5W-30 is a modern synthetic oil designed mainly to meet the requirements of the users of Ford cars where it is recommended to use oils that meet the requirements of quality standard FORD WSS-M2C-913D/C. It may be used in engines from other manufacturers, both petrol and diesel engines, where the manufacturer recommends the use of oils that comply with the quality classification ACEA A1/B1, ACEA A5/B5 and API SL/CF.
